masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"The 50-foot Christmas tree in Civic Plaza is on FIRE! The ornaments are exploding from the heat—glass shrapnel everywhere! The tree-lighting ceremony was packed with families. We need evacuation help and someone to contain those burning branches before they spread!"

Requirements

  • Evacuate civilians from the danger zone
  • Contain the fire before it spreads to nearby buildings
  • Save what you can—this tree was 100 years old
